document_data.name: Doraven Mirandor
document_data.mainbody: '''Doraven Mirandor''' was one of earliest kings of [[Impiltur]] and the 16{{th}} monarch of the [[Mirandor Dynasty]]. His reign lasted a mere three years during the 2{{nd}} century [[DR]]. He was known throughout history as '''Doraven the Bloody'''.
document_data.Relationships: He was the third son of [[Inrath Mirandor III]] and the stepbrother of [[Inrath Mirandor IV|Inrath IV]].
document_data.History: Doraven Mirandor staged a coup against his older stepbrother Inrath the IV and seized the throne of Impiltur for himself in the {{YearlinkName|159}}. He ruled over the Kingdom of Wand and Sword for a mere three years, before being slain by another stepbrother, [[Pendarn Mirandor]].
